com.vectorprint.report.data

Interface DataCollector<RD extends ReportDataHolder>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockingDataCollector, DataCollectorImpl

    public interface DataCollector<RD extends ReportDataHolder>
    To generate a report we first need to collect data.
    Author:
    Eduard Drenth at VectorPrint.nl

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Object data, String id)
      adds peaces of data to the ReportDataHolder
      RD collect()
      called by ReportBuilder.buildReport(java.lang.Object) to collect data.
      RD getDataHolder()
      get a reference to the object that will contain report data
      Class<? extends ReportBindingHelper> getDefaultBindingHelperClass()
      return the class to be used as ParameterizableBindingFactory.getBindingHelper(), NOTE that this will not override the class indicated by ParameterizableBindingFactoryImpl.PARAMHELPER.
